ygData.subject: An Out-of-Body Experience
ygData.msgSnippet: This post has alot of scenes and info that happened in the beginning of The Neo Beast Wars. If you have any questions about any of them, feel free to email me.

This post has alot of scenes and info that happened in the beginning of The 
Neo Beast Wars. If you have any questions about any of them, feel free to 
email me. Also, don't take examples of Ramulus' memories and try to base 
things on giant bots and transforming bases. The memories in this post are 
exactly the reason the rules were made.

::Ramulus::

A familiar feeling was felt as Ramulus' spark left his body. Familiar, but 
yet different in a way. This time, he was not fatally wounded, and was a bit 
more aware.

His spark flashes slightly as it is put into Fliq's body, small immages going 
through his head. They were immages from Fliq's life, random memories from 
the Maximal (If you don't mind, Mimime, can you send me some of Fliq's 
memories or something? Its not that important, though.).

Ramulus knew that while Fliq's memories were accessible to him, the reverse 
was also true. Scenes flowed from Ramulus' spark to Fliq. How he had first 
came online on a mountain range in Africa, damaged and alone, how he had 
wandered for years untill he saved a Maximal's life, and was sucked into the 
war. Memories from certain battles were also vivid: saving a tribe of humans, 
fighting against the gigantic body that Adrax used to have, looking in awe as 
Trypticon and Base (the Predacon and Alliance bases) fought, the ground 
shaking under them.

Various images, from when there were only about 20 bots on the planet, went 
off to Fliq's mind, all climaxing up to the scene of Ramulus' death. He was 
laying near the Ark, helpless and in stasis lock, just regaining 
consciousness. He saw a bot that looked like Zardus kill a few of the 
wounded, slowly turning his head as some sound drifts to him from the bushes. 
He watches as three Predacons run onto the battle field: Injector, Manterror, 
and Double Punch. Manterror turns to him, firing several ion disks into 
Ramulus' chest. Ramulus' body twitches as the ion disks go through him, 
everything going black...

Back in reality, Ramulus' TM2 spark extends its green repair coils, begining 
its job.
